oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Farmer holding threshing cradle
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Threshing; Agricultural machinery & implements; Harvesting; Wheat
Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scott LaFallette holding his harvesting cradle while standing in a field with tied sheafs of wheat piled at his feet.
